isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Orifice Tube System, Pre-March 2007 - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500, 8600 - SYSTEM MAINTENANCE - OFF-SEASON CARE

svcproc.title: OFF-SEASON CARE
svcproc.para: This system does not require any off-season maintenance. Do not remove compressor drive belt during the off-season, as clutch and compressor bearings may become brinneled. It is not necessary to operate the A/C system periodically during the off-season because the system uses the A/C compressor while in the defrost mode, if the ambient temperature is above freezing.
